channel.title: Can someone actually tell me how to make my server online(Millions of shit tuts)
channel.description: Please, I need to make my server online USING Hamachi. Iv'e searched this like a million of times and I come up with something shit. You can give me a link to the site for a CLEAR tutorial if you can't be bothered to type. Please and thank you!

item.title: Can someone actually tell me how to make my server online(Millions of shit tuts)
item.dc:creator: @DeadTriton DeadTriton
item.description:
@DeadTriton wrote:

This one works great, only problem is I’m having trouble figuring out how to get the ‘no-ip’ account working in the scripts. So just replace the (When the person says to in the tutorial) ‘allianceps.no-ip.biz’ with 127.0.0.1 which is (Home Local) don’t put your public IP there EVER. Anyway I’m actually working on how to edit the accounts since the account files are .per extensions, they come up readable as they are Java origin, and the commands with the “::” don’t quiet work yet (I’m working on how to fix this). Allot of the servers you will download and configure are really difficult to get working the way you want them to, I recommend just using a 317 server to start off with, I assume they are easier to code then 508+.

Oh well Good luck man if you need any info on the 614 server add me - matts_here@live.com

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone actually tell me how to make my server online(Millions of shit tuts)

item.title: Can someone actually tell me how to make my server online(Millions of shit tuts)
item.dc:creator: @Marine5288 Marine5288
item.description:
@Marine5288 wrote:

kid2kewl2bereal:

I wouldn’t use Hamachi if you actually want a lot of players, most Hamachi servers are pretty empty. It’s really not too difficult to get a server up without it.

I agree, although port forwarding is screwing a lot of people up these days. Try looking at the tutorials for port forwarding

Here.

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone actually tell me how to make my server online(Millions of shit tuts)
item.dc:creator: @fil55 fil55
item.description:
@fil55 wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:2, topic:398332”]You just power on. Make a new host thing. Plug in the IP given to you into the client IP areas. Get people to install hamachi and join your network and then they can play. You also gotta run your server.[/quote] Oh my… is that all I had to do? I spent ages looking. Any thanks so much and also thanks for quick reply

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone actually tell me how to make my server online(Millions of shit tuts)
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

You just power on. Make a new host thing. Plug in the IP given to you into the client IP areas. Get people to install hamachi and join your network and then they can play. You also gotta run your server.
